attributes.action: free salman and his family from an illegal broadcast in kilburn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
salman jafri and family have to put with an illegal broadcast lasting 4 years so far - 5 years next year in february 2010 sometime.

racial and religious hatred plus physical assault such as now in my back  

using sound direction and surveillance equipment continuely deny freedom based on greed and racism and religious hatred.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
